00029 class grid_line;

00035 class SURFIT_EXPORT operD2 : public oper {
00036 public:
00037 
00040         operD2() {};
00041 
00051         operD2(int iN, int iNN, 
00052                REAL ihx, REAL ihy,
00053                bitvec * imask_solved,
00054                bitvec * imask_undefined,
00055                grid_line * ifault);
00056  
00057         virtual ~operD2();
00058 
00059         REAL operator()(int i, int j, int * next_j = NULL) const;
00060         REAL at(int i, int j, int * next_j = NULL) const;
00061         REAL mult_line(int J, const REAL * b_begin, const REAL * b_end) const;
00062         REAL mult_transposed_line(int J, const REAL * b_begin, const REAL * b_end) const;
00063 
00064         virtual long cols() const;
00065         virtual long rows() const;
00066 
00067         REAL norm() const;
00068 
00069 protected:
00070 
00072         int N;
00074         int NN; 
00076         int MM;
00077 
00079         REAL hx4;
00081         REAL hy4;
00082 
00084         REAL _hx4;
00086         REAL _hy4;
00088         REAL _hxy4;
00089 
00091         bitvec * mask_solved;
00093         bitvec * mask_undefined;
00095         grid_line * fault;
00096 
00098         void make_mask();
00099 
00101         bitvec * mask;
00102 
00104         REAL operator_serve(int i, int j,
00105                             bool first_x, bool second_x, bool third_x,
00106                             bool first_xx, bool second_xx,
00107                             bool first_yy, bool second_yy,
00108                             bool first_y, bool second_y, bool third_y,
00109                             int * next_j) const;
00110 
00111 };
